description: Learning industry standards and tools & technologies like Angular, .Net 6,  MongoDB, Redis, Atlassian Bitbucket, RabbitMQ etc.
Translated Several CS50 technical videos to Bangla, in order to make those videos more accessible to Bangladeshi learners.
Made photos & short videos as part of their marketing campaign. Used tools like Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro.
